寡暮し: (やもめぐらし) - widowhood; widowerhood; viduity
寡暮らし: (やもめぐらし) - widowhood; widowerhood; viduity
寡聞: (kabun) - tendo pouco conhecimento (de), estando mal informado
寡黙: (kamoku) - não comunicativo, quieto, taciturno, reservado, calado
寥々: (りょうりょう) - lonely; rare; few
寥寥: (りょうりょう) - lonely; rare; few
實に: (まことに) - indeed; really; absolutely; truly; actually; very; quite
實手: (じゅって) - short truncheon with a hook made of metal or wood (used by policeman and private thief-takers in Edo Japan)
寧ろ: (mushiro) - de preferência, melhor, em vez disso
審判: (shinpan) - arbitragem, julgamento, decisão, veredicto, árbitro, juiz
審判の日: (しんぱんのひ) - Judgment Day (as described in Christian tradition)
審判委員: (しんぱんいいん) - {sumo} five ringside judges
審判官: (しんぱんかん) - administrative law judge; appeal examiner (e.g. in patents)
審判部長: (しんぱんぶちょう) - {sumo} head judge
審判離婚: (しんばんりこん) - divorce by (Family Court) arbitration
審査請求: (しんさせいきゅう) - {law} formal objection (to an administrative disposition); request for examination (of a patent); request for administrative review
審決: (しんけつ) - trial decision; decision by a court; judgment from a trial
審神者: (さにわ) - {Shinto} person who judges which god or spirit has taken possession of a miko
審級: (しんきゅう) - instance (e.g. first instance, second instance, etc. in a legal proceeding)
審美歯科: (しんびしか) - cosmetic dentistry; aesthetic dentistry; esthetic dentistry
審議入り: (しんぎいり) - initiation of debate (e.g. in parliament)
審議官: (しんぎかん) - Assistant Vice-Minister; Deputy Director-General; Councillor
寮父: (りょうふ) - housefather; dorm father; houseparent
寮生活: (りょうせいかつ) - life in a dormitory; dormitory life
寮監: (りょうかん) - housemaster; resident advisor; houseparent; housefather; housemother; dorm parent
寮育: (りょういく) - rehabilitation (e.g. of disabled children)
寮長: (りょうちょう) - dormitory leader; dormitory superintendent
寵児: (ちょうじ) - favorite child; favourite child
寵姫: (ちょうき) - one's favorite mistress; one's favourite mistress
寵愛こうじて尼にする: (ちょうあいこうじてあまにする) - to love one's child too much for their own good; to love one's daughter so much as to make her a nun
寵愛一身: (ちょうあいいっしん) - (yoji) standing highest in one's master's favor; monopolizing the affection (favor) of the lord; being the lord's favorite lady
寵愛昂じて尼にする: (ちょうあいこうじてあまにする) - to love one's child too much for their own good; to love one's daughter so much as to make her a nun
寵愛昂じて尼になす: (ちょうあいこうじてあまになす) - to love one's child too much for their own good; to love one's daughter so much as to make her a nun
寵物: (ちょうもつ) - pet (thing); favorite thing (toy, gadget, etc.)
寵臣: (ちょうしん) - favored retainer; favoured retainer
寸々: (ずだずだ) - to pieces; into shreds
寸でのところで: (すんでのところで) - almost; very nearly
寸での所で: (すんでのところで) - almost; very nearly
寸借詐欺: (すんしゃくさぎ) - (yoji) petty swindling; petty swindler
寸分たがわず: (すんぶんたがわず) - accurate; to the inch; exact
寸分の狂いもない: (すんぶんのくるいもない) - accurate; flawless; perfectly ordered; without deviation
寸分の狂いも無い: (すんぶんのくるいもない) - accurate; flawless; perfectly ordered; without deviation
寸分違わず: (すんぶんたがわず) - accurate; to the inch; exact
寸前: (sunzen) - logo antes de, à beira de, à beira de; logo em frente a, logo à frente de
寸善尺魔: (すんぜんしゃくま) - (yoji) in evil, there is odds; there is more evil than good in this world; one good thing tends to cause many bad things to happen
寸寸: (ずだずだ) - to pieces; into shreds
寸志: (すんし) - small present; small token of appreciation; with compliments (e.g. written on small gift)
寸描: (すんびょう) - thumbnail sketch; brief sketch
